Text: Hey zitek..Is there any chance you have Polka Pops 1 and 2 by Klaus wunderlich?..It`s near impossible to find them anymore..Both brilliant Albums..Lost mine to wear and tear.
hello SCLEMTAK Howz it Hanging..Looks like were had the same thoughts....
Greetings Plantanistriff!!..Yeah!!..Shame i cant get hold em though!..POLKA POPS 1+2 are very,very hard to get..Shame nobody has em..It realy is music to go (FISHING) With..Dont you agree?..
